description: This test case examines placing an order after logging in works as intended or not

steps.name: Enter name and email then click Sign Up
Verify 'ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION' page is shown
Fill the sign-up formData with user details
Validate mobile number field accepts only digits
Validate name field is not editable after initial input
Verify 'Logged in as' text is displayed
Verify 'Login to your account' text is displayed
